mean_cn: adj. 必要的；祈使的；急需的；  n. 命令；必要的事；义务；驱使
mean_en: very urgent or important; needing immediate attention
word_etyma: imper统治，指挥+ative...的 → 跟统治相似的 → imperative必要的
short_phrase: It's imperative to finish your work!
sentence: It is imperative to call 119 if your house is on fire.
sentence_trans: 如果你的家里着火了你必须打119报警.
